result.title: Expectation Value Problem.
result.content: Can somebody please help me out in this problem https://www.codechef.com/CDWR2014/problems/CW2/ My approach: Consider any number i.We can calculate its contribution in final sum.There are n-i numbers bigger than i.We choose any j of them and arrange them before i and rest (n-j-1) numbers are arranged after i. Thus the formula: This sum can then be divided by n!. I saw a few AC codes and somehow people have reduced it to sum of harmonic series,however Im not able to reduce my formula further. Can somebody please help!!.
